text: He looks great in a suit.
-[woman 2] Is she Paik Sa-eon's wife? -[woman 1] They look good together.
Those people are looking at me, not you.
Sure, they might be curious about you.
there can't be any misunderstandings, interest, or rumors
[You-ri] Heavy rainfall is expected nationwide this year once again.
we must prepare in advance for landslides, heavy rain, and typhoons.
How can it stop there? It looks like she's cursing!
[You-ri] We aim to review last year's landslide site
and consider ways to reduce damage.
Director Yoon's a superior, but I can't stand how rude he is.
[director] What the hell are you doing?
Put up the apology message now!
The emergency briefing is in five minutes.
-Can you interpret-- -[director] No. Tell her to go.
That's all for today. You may leave. Great work.
They keep having the spokesperson do it.
Don't the Chief Security Officer or Foreign Ministry
usually take turns briefing for situations like this?
When the abduction happened. You don't remember, do you?
That's why they keep sending out Paik Sa-eon.
Paik Sa-eon overshadows the Foreign Ministry and the ministers.
[cameraman 1] Hey, I think he's coming out.
I'm Paik Sa-eon, spokesperson for the Presidential Office.
Today, from 1:48 p.m. to 4:20 p.m. Korea Standard Time…
[cameraman 2] Good vocalization and a great voice.
What was he like as a news anchor?
The same as he is now.
He ranked first in preference, trust, and ratings.
I can't hear Sa-eon's voice well because of you.
Being a fangirl even while she's working.
warning that they will kill the hostages
if their demands are not met.
I would like to state the government's position on this.
When it comes to negotiations with the kidnappers regarding the ransom…
The government considers their acts as inhumane crimes
We promise to mobilize all national resources to rescue our citizens,
We will never compromise on the principles we must uphold.
on third-country commercial vessels in the Strait of Surmuz.
The illegal use of force in international waters,
where the freedom of navigation for vessels is guaranteed,
the government will strengthen safety guidance activities
and implement measures to prevent similar incidents
a temporary media control will be implemented
Why are they trying to silence us?
Foreign media are already reporting this.
and unreliable personal broadcasts will take over.
Aren't reporters from our country's leading media outlets all here?
If you don't mislead public opinion,
the citizens won't believe what fake news says.
The current situation is bad, isn't it?
You've come this far with that saying,
but I've never seen you look so scared before.
But am I the only one here who is scared?
I ask all of the journalists here today.
and pray for the safe return of our citizens.
will do its utmost to ensure not a single life is lost.
Check major headlines, personal broadcasts, new media,
-Report public opinion to me. -[Young-woo] Yes, sir.
Post live updates from the negotiation team.
SINIL DAILY NEWS, DONGYUL DAILY NEWS, DAILY TAEJIN
You know the election camp starts in a month, right?
I was going to ask her to quit anyway.
Last year, you suddenly went on about not being able to breathe.
So I guess he let you work to give you room to breathe.
But exposing your name and face was something
Put an end to it quickly.
is there no improvement in your selective mutism?
Is there really a need for improvement?
It's probably better to keep her mouth shut.
I'll make sure nothing interferes with the election…
I need to put that hag in her place one day.
If you stole someone else's man, you should do a better job!
You haven't even been able to win your man's heart.
Who do you take after? It certainly isn't me.
You're Chungwoon Daily News chairman's second daughter
HANNAM-DONG, SIGN LANGUAGE CENTER PYEONGCHANG-DONG, BROADCAST CENTER
the government stated that it will not compromise

[reporter] The engine of an unattended car starts on its own.
Malware is implanted in the vehicle's navigation software.
It's car hacking, where someone manipulates another person's vehicle.
HACKED NAVIGATION SYSTEM MANIPULATES ENGINE AND LOCKS
Yes, we've reviewed everything there too.
Netizens have uncovered your hidden background,
including FBI training and NYPD hostage negotiation courses.
They want you to be sent to the negotiation team.
It's a mess… [chuckles nervously] What? Excuse me.
it appears that there are no speculative articles
A very malicious report that distorts the facts.
Jang Hyeok-jin from HBC is at it again.
He seems friendly, but then he throws in a curveball.
what do we say when we request a deletion?
TAESAN DAILY NEWS SOCIAL AFFAIRS EDITOR KIM HYEON-WOO
[Do-jae] This is the negotiation team's timeline.
-You got a call. -[Sa-eon] Who is it this time?
-I'll hang up if you don't. -[kidnapper] Paik Sa-eon.
What time did you part ways?
-[Sa-eon talking indistinctly on TV] -Your face is on every channel today.
Yeah, I brought her home. I'll send her off after dinner.
Former journalists really are a different breed.
Do you even know who my wife is?
I'm far too busy for these types of prank calls today.
I dare you to hang up on me again.
[stutters] a knife to your wife's throat right now.
Don't just talk about it, do it.
You can demand however much you want.
[kidnapper stuttering] I seriously love this expression the most.
Sis, do you get it now?
why does your husband think I'm joking?
What the hell did he mean earlier?
Why did he ask me if I knew who his wife was?
Wait. Or does he have another wife?
Well, it doesn't matter if he has more than one wife.
but the wife Sa-eon cares about the most
[kidnapper] Is he going to ignore me again?
Do you know what kind of phone this is?
The voice modulation is also automatic.
It can't be tracked for ten minutes.
[chuckles] I already prepped this car in advance too.
That's why it moves on its own. [laughs]
[yelling] Paik Sa-eon, isn't picking up the phone!
I'll put Mr. Paik on the phone.
[Sa-eon] I told you not to answer it. Why did you?
Listen up, you pathetic loser scumbag.
What did I say? I told you not to call me again.
Fine, then hurry up and do it.
Mr. Paik, Argan called through the hotline and requests your presence.
-[Sa-eon] Don't touch my things. -[Young-woo] Yes, sir.
[kidnapper] What the hell? What are you doing?
and the Argan armed group agreed to release all Korean hostages.
Here is a statement from spokesperson Paik Sa-eon.
[Sa-eon] Thank you to the hostages and the public
and to the media for your cooperation in ensuring national security and safety.
to the Argan government and allied international organizations,
and we will take all necessary measures to ensure the safe return of the hostages.
[Hyeok-jin] Can I get an exclusive interview, Mr. Paik?
Why are you heading out so early? It's not even 9:00 yet.
Did you wait to see what time I clocked out?
I noticed you took down all of my pictures.
A journalist should report the truth.
I didn't distort it. It's PR.
-You lack humanity. -I didn't ask you to do that.
Hey, Sa-eon? Open the door. Hey!
Hey, what are you doing? Hey!
[Sa-eon] Hyeok-jin, I have a favor to ask.
What's wrong with you? You're crazy!
I was wrong. I won't do it again.
Trace this number as quickly as possible.
It's a phishing scam, but I have a bad feeling.
A bad feeling? So do I.
I never assumed my number would be safe from scammers.
He's pulling out all the stops.
So I just can't let it go.
Why is he in such a hurry?
By the way, what's with the food?
Didn't you have dinner with your mom?
[Do-jae] It's not using the cell towers. We can't trace it with just a number.
[Hyeok-jin] Hey, 406 is an area code in the States.
Is it because it's a virtual phone number?
So is real-time tracking the only way?
And to track it in real time, they have to call again.
So I have to wait for his call?
And the call must last at least ten minutes.
but we need personal information to identify--
It's a man. I'm sure of it.
And he was on drugs or not in his right mind.
[Sa-eon] He made the threatening call at the perfect time.
It was clear he was trying to shake me up
[Do-jae] Yes, there are many groups that would be glad to see you fail.
But just in case, I want her to be under protection.
Without them knowing she's my wife.
[Do-jae] Okay. There's a team I can trust.
I'll call them myself. Just give me the number.
[Sa-eon] Also, about the event at the British Embassy tomorrow,
didn't you say we needed a sign language interpreter?
There's an event at the British Embassy tomorrow at 6:00 p.m.
I'll send someone to pick you up by 5:00, so be ready.
The ambassador's wife is deaf, so we need a sign language interpreter.
It's not a couple's event or anything. Don't get the wrong idea.
[Yeon-hui] Where are you? Are you at home? Why won't you pick up?
WHY WAS HE LOOKING FOR ME?
[Yeon-hui] I don't know. He asked me if I was with you.
I said I'd send you home after dinner, so tell him so when he comes home.
There's just a month left until the presidential campaign.
You probably won't need to show yourself,
but just in case, see the dermatologist and plastic surgeon starting tomorrow.
When did you stop going to the clinic?
No wonder why you're not pregnant!
I'll send the medicine tomorrow, so be ready to get in shape.
I told you to quit your job.
It doesn't belong to you. You're just the stand-in.
[inhales] The wedding will be held in private.
You'll never have to pretend to be my wife in front of others again.
Are you going to strip naked?
You don't have to read it all, just remember this.
One, the bride cannot initiate a divorce.
Two, especially not during the election period.
Three, you will not publicly disclose your name or face as Paik Sa-eon's wife.
If any of these is violated, the penalty will be two billion won.
Forget the illusion that we're married.
SPOKESPERSON PAIK'S WEDDING SUDDENLY TURNED PRIVATE
SOME SAY THE WEDDING WAS HELD IN PRIVATE TO HIDE THE BRIDE FROM THE PUBLIC
SIGN IS A LANGUAGE SEONGNANG-GU SIGN LANGUAGE CENTER
Come at me if you have a death wish! You bastards!
Who is it at this hour?
Didn't I tell you not to run your mouth?
-What's she doing? -[man 2] Do you want to lose your teeth?
You must have a death wish, bastard. Eyes down!
What kind of intense practice is this?
Are you interpreting for the police?
Or did a loan shark ask for an interpreter? Is the debtor deaf?
But you've never done this before.
Just do what you usually do.
Watch the video you practice with.
There have been a lot of briefings lately. Want me to bring you some?
You said you liked his videos because they're like a textbook.
You said you wanted to be on-screen
with Paik Sa-eon even if it was just a brief moment.
I'm done with Paik Sa-eon's videos. I've done enough already.
-[guest] It's good to see you guys. -Yeah.
Mr. Ambassador, I'd like to wish you a very happy birthday.
It's an honor to be here celebrating this special day with you.
-Well, your presence means a lot. -[Sa-eon chuckles]
And I know you've been incredibly busy the past few days.
If this were an official event, I might've been too tired to come.
But since you invited me as a friend, I'm here to have fun.
Well, do make sure you have a good time. [chuckles]
Nice to meet you, Madam Harris. My name's Paik Sa-eon.
I didn't know the spokesperson's wife could sign.
I'm just here as an interpreter. There's no personal relationship.
I don't know any sign language at all. Did the ladies talk about that?
Well, I thought you two were married. [chuckles] But I was mistaken.
Thank you, anyway, for bringing an interpreter for my wife.
my wife has a disability too.
[in English] Actually, my wife is also challenged.
I don't believe I've ever seen your wife at an official event.
How come she doesn't accompany you?
[interpreter in English] I would say my wife is…
[ambassador] Your weakness? Because of her disability?
[in Korean] I face attacks from all sides.
In a way, you could say I'm the government's official scapegoat.
my wife to be exposed to indiscriminate attacks like I am.
Oh, a weakness in that sense. [chuckles]
So that's why you keep her hidden away.
Sa-eon, despite appearances, you're quite a hopeless romantic.
We can track it once you get the call,
so just be mindful of the time.
[Sa-eon] Are you trying to get drunk?
I'LL GO HOME IF I'M DONE HERE.
You just have to stand quietly next to me.
Go sit somewhere if your legs hurt. Stop drinking.
Do you think I can't hear just because I can't speak?
Do you think I can't feel emotions?
You don't want to expose me to indiscriminate attacks?
Then why am I hurt and torn apart already?
Did you say I was your weakness?
is a wound that's prone to infection.
When someone touches it, you flinch,
But you didn't act like that yesterday.
Did you just curse at me?
But then, I might not be the wife
Did you fail to kill her?
You went on and on yesterday.
I didn't have time to listen to your rambling.
Then let's hear your plan on how you're going to hurt her in the future.
I've got plenty of free time today.
I guess there's not much to do at a party.
I'm glad you're having a good time.
Are you surprised by how close I am?
I've been watching you the whole time, but you didn't notice.
How could someone like you get in here?
The bruschetta with the truffle on top was really good.
Stop laughing and answer me. Who are you?
How did you get in here?
The answer to the question you asked earlier.
how I plan on hurting your wife.
[woman over phone] Hello? What's wrong? Did something happen?
You said I can't be possibly here.
A loser like you is probably hiding and snickering in your room.
Do you really think someone like you could do anything to my wife?
Listen up, if you wanted to threaten me, you chose the wrong hostage.
Yeah, that's right. The world has no idea who she is.
They don't know who your real wife is.
Your real wife is the one you were supposed to marry, your real fiancée.
The eldest daughter of the chairman of Chungwoon Daily News, Hong In-a.
She ran away the day before the wedding, and I heard no one knows where she is.
But then, Chungwoon Daily News and your family
You had to go through with the marriage, so you married her sister as a hostage?
Either way, I bet people will love that. Right?
Don't you want to know how I know a secret nobody else knows?
I'm going to tell you my demands now.
and get back with your real fiancée.
You don't need Hong Hee-joo in your life anyway, do you?
What did I say? I told you not to call me again.
[kidnapper] I'm sure I was clear too.
I'm going to kill your wife.
I have something to say to him, so call him back now!
Unless you want your personal life to ruin your father's election,
return things to what they were.
If you don't, I'll expose the secrets of your marriage.
It's funny Paik Sa-eon would be scared because of a loser like me. [laughs]
You have until tomorrow to decide.
Or we can settle for two billion won. You have until tomorrow.
how do punks like you never change your repertoire?
you should study up on me first.
eager to get me to speak at any cost.
Turning a lame scandal into fake news is easy for me.
And I can get rid of a pathetic blackmailer with my eyes shut.
Why did you think I'd accept the presumptuous demand
Why are you dragging my person into this?
Hey, do you know what happened to your precious person yesterday?
No, I mean, I almost killed her!
I kidnapped her in her car, choked her, and grabbed her by the hair.
I had a knife to her. I was going to kill her. Do you get it?
What do you mean? It was scary.
So she was scared. What happened next?
I was about to kill her, and she couldn't even beg for her life.
Then you ruthlessly hung up the phone, saying to call when there's a corpse!
Yeah, Hong Hee-joo really could've ended up dead.
The car rolled on the slippery road!
Am I screwed, or did he fall for it?
Have you never seen her naked?
What the heck? Why is he coming?
There can't be a Hong Hee-joo I don't know about.
